reviews.review_msg: BEST PROFESSOR I'VE EVER HAD. She has lit a fire in me! Amazing course design, great content, caring and on time.

Shayna has extensive experience in the field of human rights and journalism and expects students to put what is learned in the classroom into practice. This course relied heavily on work with the community and challenged us to go beyond anything we had ever done before. She expects nothing less than your best work. Bonus: class was always engaging!

Best professor I have ever had. Shayna is so passionate about the material and is supportive of students' interests and ambitions. I learned so much in the class, made great friends due to the interaction facilitated by Shayna and am dying to take another class with her. Always looked forward to this course.

Excellent, engaging prof. He has a different teaching style and approaches migration from all perspectives. He doesn't use tech but is a great lecturer. Took his class 4 years ago and still remember it to this day. Would highly recommend taking a course with him.
Great prof, really makes you think about new concepts. Short papers have helped my writing skills profusely! Take the course.

My favorite professor! Great lectures, and makes every second interesting. Though, he does not use technology and can sometimes be hard to get a hold of on email. Fair grader, and as long as you are prepared and participating his classes are really amazing.
He should be faculty.  Very passionate about the material (migrants).
